long_description: Once again shattering the ceiling of low weight, surprising warmth and packability, the Therm-a-Rest NeoAir XLite sleeping pad sets a new standard for gram-counting backpackers and adventure racers. Streamlined shaped and advanced fabrics reduce the weight-almost 15% lighter than the original. Patent-pending reflective layer returns heat back to your body and creates air pockets that conserve warmth. Patent-pending welded-nylon grid of chambers further ensures high warmth and low weight. Innovative baffling minimizes the movement of air so you shift less and rest better. Comes with a stuff sack and repair kit.
